oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1947-03-09 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from March 9, 1947. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Cottonseed Clark, and guests Virginia Mayo and Montie Montana.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage; Virginia Mayo; Montie Montana
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Radio play 'Alias: Mary Smithers' (Virginia Mayo, Montie Montana, cast) [continued from part 1] -- Cottonseed Clark introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- When The Bloom Is On The Sage (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Virginia Mayo -- Foy Willing, Virginia Mayo, and Montie Montana talk -- Cottonseed Clark introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Tumbling Tumbleweeds (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Cottonseed Clark) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KNX (Radio station : Los Angeles, Calif.); All star western theatre (Radio program); Clark, Cottonseed; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Dean, Jimmy; Montana, Montie; Mayo, Virginia, 1920-2005
